comments.body: FYI the `override` here shouldn't be necessary, I think you can remove `val semanticdbReporter = None` in `ReporterOps` and it will still work

We need to have a reference to pick it up in `ReporterOps`. Your proposal can be done if we change `val semanticdbReporter:Option[SemanticdbReporter] = None` to `def semanticdbReporter: Option[SemanticdbReporter]` in `ReporterOps`. By doing so it's not an override and it can be removed.

    val originalOptions = options.map(option => "-P:" + name + ":" + option)
    val parsedConf = SemanticdbConfig.parse(originalOptions, errFn, g.reporter)
    config = amendTargetRoot(parsedConf)
